description: A package that contains an array of every single file extension there is for binary files

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES2022 for web browsers with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Import for modules

name: binaryextensions

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:deno && npm run our:compile:edition-browsers && npm run our:compile:edition-es5 && npm run our:compile:edition-es5-esm && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-browsers: tsc --module ESNext --target ES2022 --outDir ./edition-browsers --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-browsers/source || ( mv edition-browsers/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-browsers && mv edition-temp edition-browsers ) )
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) ) && printf '%s' '{"type": "commonjs"}' > edition-es5/package.json
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5-esm: tsc --module ESNext --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5-esm --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5-esm/source || ( mv edition-es5-esm/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5-esm && mv edition-temp edition-es5-esm ) ) && printf '%s' '{"type": "module"}' > edition-es5-esm/package.json
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog:
cat ./HISTORY.md | grep "v$npm_package_version" || (printf '%s
' "add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version" && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag:
export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (printf '%s
' 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag "v$npm_package_version" -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:module && npm run our:verify:prettier

title: The Definitive List of Binary Extensions
